meta.title: ChilamVPN – Self-service cloud VPN platform
meta.description: Securely connect your systems and business units through our self-service cloud VPN.

hero.tagline: Securely connect your systems and business units through our self-service cloud VPN.

items.title: Simple self-service
items.body: Register users and devices in minutes with an intuitive web interface. Download ready-to-use configurations and connect without IT support.

items.title: Strong security
items.body: Built on next-generation VPN technology with modern cryptography and optimized performance to guarantee encrypted connections.

items.title: No extra hardware
items.body: Connect to your systems without physical firewalls or public IP addresses. Everything is provisioned automatically in the cloud.

items.title: Scalable and flexible
items.body: Add devices and users, extend your connections across regions, and manage access from a streamlined admin panel.

steps.title: Request your account
steps.body: Sign in securely to the platform. Each user receives a personal dashboard and unique keys.

steps.title: Download the configuration
steps.body: Automatically generate your VPN configuration file and a QR code to import it on your devices.

steps.title: Connect your teams
steps.body: Activate the connection and start linking your systems and business units through our secure network.

legal.title: Responsible use
legal.body: ChilamVPN is designed to securely connect corporate sites and systems. We do not provide VPN services for anonymous browsing or bypassing geographic restrictions; our priority is reliable connectivity and policy compliance.
